code: import{useState}from"react";import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Todo(){const[addtask,setAddtask]=useState("");const[list,setList]=useState([]);function addTodo(){setList(list=>{const updatedlist=[...list,addtask];setAddtask('');return updatedlist;});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"To-Do List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add your Task",value:addtask,onChange:e=>setAddtask(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:"submit",onClick:addTodo,children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:list!=[]&&list.map((data,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"listData",children:data})},i)});})})})]});}export default Todo;
